name: Bag Tag Challenge
description:
Fall Season Promotion! Get BTC for .99!

Welcome to Tribaloid disc golf sports club! Compete against other members in multiplayer real time game play. Become a Professional Tag Hunter and collect the lowest bag tag on the disc golf course.

+ Play with Innova Discs and disc flight ratings
+ Compete in Real time Multiplayer for lowest tag in club on 3 disc golf courses
+ Take turns with friends (turn based) to play for lowest score on course
+ 3D disc golf physics engine
+ Single Player, offline mode
+ Upgrade disc golf bag to hold more discs on course
+ Buy Disc's at the Disc Shop and sell/recycle old ones.
+ Modify bag tag in tag editor
+ GameCenter Leaderboards
+ GameCenter Achievements
